question: If you have a dream about a dead person in your family or anyone that has passed away does it mean that death is coming to you or someone in your family?
answer:
QUESTION
I have had many dreams of my aunt that passed away about two years ago(she was not muslim) and I was wanting to know if this means anything. Could you please clarify what it means if you dream of anyone who has died, if you visit them or they visit you in the dream.
ANSWER


Share:
Seeing dreams of the deceased is simply to remind one of death and to make the necessary preparations for it.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
